item.title: Resume
item.description: Download Resume Hongxueyang (Sharon) Zheng EDUCATION Cornell University, College of Engineering, Ithaca, NY——Expected December 2022 Master of Engineering in Financial Engineering University of Wisconsin-Madison, Madison, WI——December 2020 Bachelor of Science in Mathematics & Economics (Double Major), Graduation with Distinction, GPA: 3.97 Sun Yat-sen University, Guangzhou, China——July 2018 Bachelor of Science in Materials Science and Engineering Selected Coursework: Optimization, Simulation Modeling and Analysis, Machine Learning for Data Science, Monte Carlo Methods in Financial Engineering, Number Theory, Derivatives Securities, Portfolio Management, Financial Statement Analysis
